page.title: 03EDUCATION (N.LEEDS)
page.content: PRIMARY SCHOOLS- This kind of schooling follows straight after a nursery in Leeds. The age range is 5 to 9 years.Most primary schools have a set uniform,but it is not always compulsory.There is a choice between school dinners and packed lunches from home in some schools. Pupils can learn many subjects including Maths and English but usually the lessons are not scheduled in a timetable.Pupils are set in classes at random, not according to ability. The schools differ in time eg. some start at 9 am. until 3.30pm.The capacities of the schools are between 200-500 children.
